chinese: 有狐綏綏、在彼淇梁。心之憂矣、之子無裳。
english: There is a fox, solitary and suspicious,At that dam over the Qi.My heart is sad; -That man has no lower garment.

chinese: 有狐綏綏、在彼淇厲。心之憂矣、之子無帶。
english: There is a fox, solitary and suspicious,At that deep ford of the Qi.My heart is sad; -That man has no girdle.

chinese: 有狐綏綏、在彼淇側。心之憂矣、之子無服。
english: There is a fox, solitary and suspicious,By the side there of the Qi.My heart is sad; -That man has no clothes.
